column4: I'm running ubuntu netbook remix 9.04 on an eee pc (model 1000HE). After installing and removing (purging) a program (eeepc-acpi-utilities) my compiz / desktop effects / maybe my video drivers were broken.... can anyone help?
how do I check if my video drivers are installed properly?
can you see things on the screen?
just kidding with you. i'm not sure to be honest
